name: NSDR (Non-Sleep Deep Rest)
description: Neuroscience-backed recovery protocol by Dr. Andrew Huberman. Combines body scan, breath work, and guided relaxation for deep nervous system recovery.

exercises.name: NSDR Protocol (10min)
exercises.description: Quick nervous system reset - equivalent to 60-90min of sleep for cognitive function
exercises.instructions: Lie flat. Progressive muscle relaxation from feet to head. Long exhale breathing. Allow mind to drift but stay awake. Body gets deep rest.

exercises.name: Extended NSDR (20min)
exercises.instructions: Lie down. Systematic relaxation of all body parts (2min each area). Focus on long exhales. Stay at edge of sleep without crossing over. Body recovery without actual sleep.

exercises.name: NSDR / Yoga Nidra Hybrid (30min)
exercises.description: Traditional yoga nidra format with NSDR principles
exercises.instructions: Lie in savasana. Guided body awareness, breath awareness, visualization. Aim is deep rest while remaining conscious. Traditional practice meets modern neuroscience.
